query: GRAN FONDO STRADE BIANCHE gravel race Siena

videos.title: Gran Fondo Strade Bianche 2025 | Best of
videos.description:
La decima edizione della Gran Fondo Strade Bianche Estra è stata un vero spettacolo! Il 9 marzo 2025, partendo dalla Fortezza Medicea di Siena, 6.500 ciclisti hanno conquistato gli sterrati più iconici della Toscana, in una giornata da incorniciare. Un evento da sold out in poche ore, che ha celebrato dieci anni di passione, fatica e bellezza sui percorsi dei professionisti. Rivivi con noi le emozioni, i paesaggi mozzafiato e tutta l’adrenalina di questa edizione storica!

The 10th edition of the Gran Fondo Strade Bianche Estra was pure magic! On March 9th, 2025, 6,500 cyclists took off from Siena’s historic Fortezza Medicea to tackle the most iconic gravel roads of Tuscany. The event sold out in just a few hours, marking a decade of passion, challenge, and beauty along the same route as the pros. Relive the highlights of this unforgettable edition – filled with adrenaline, stunning scenery, and the true spirit of cycling!

videos.title: Goldilocks Gran Fondo ! Strade Bianche Fusing Road, Gravel, Speed & Exhilaration + Power Data
videos.description:
This year I said to myself there's no need to keep looking for the new best thing, or a bigger better challenge.  Just enjoy some of the events, activities and races you know you've loved in the past... so it was a 'no brainer' to sign back up for one of Europe's premier amateur events, Gran Fondo Strade Bianche.  Providing afficionado's a unique and exhilarating experience providing THE perfect fusion of punchy terrain, gravel, tarmac and speed !  The not too short and not too long, the Goldilocks Granfondo for sure!   

This video is different to my previous Strade Bianche Video, which had many camera angles and demonstrated the beauty of the event.  This one focuses on the rider perspective with full power overlay, so you can see where I pushed hard and where I conserved a little energy for a decent time.

As always Andiamo Cycling arranged a perfect 4 days, and I would also highlight that this is not a paid promotion, I pay full price and highly recommend them for this event and many others.  Their website link is below.

www.andiamocycling.com
www.gardabikehotel.com
  
To translate the subtitles to your preferred language, please go to the settings cog on the video, and make sure subtitles are turned on.  Then select auto-translate, and then select the language you prefer.

Please leave those comments and hit that subscribe 

Thanks ever so much for all of your support! And whoever you are, what ever your do, please remember to LIVE THRIVE AND STAY HEALTHY ! 

Follow my journey  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bikeracingwithoutmercy/
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/BRWM
00:00 Introduction on the Start Line
00:47 Descent into Chaos !
03:47 1st Gravel Sector - Flowing
05:28 2nd Gravel Sector - Rapid
06:23 Chaos on 1st Climb !
11:23 Beauty, Speed & Strappatos
13:28 3rd Sector: Elevate then Accelerate
15:44 Rapid descent into 4-6th Sectors
17:38 STEELING Watts
19:00 7th Sector - STEEP STEEP STEEP
21:26 8th - The Koppenberg in Italia
23:22 9th - Gravel Finale - STEEPER STILL
25:26 Ascent into Siena: Fontebranda San Caterina
27:38 Finish Line, Medals & Peroni
